title: Waterfront Luxury in Lake Tahoe
description: Step onto the soft-sand shores of the largest Alpine Lake in North America and into a classic ski chalet with a luxurious waterfront upgrade at The Lodge at Edgewood Tahoe. Discover a skier’s paradise on the slopes of the Sierra Nevada Mountains or a tranquil bliss on the edge of the sapphire freshwater lake. Spend five, seven or nine nights in the gorgeous outdoors of South Lake Tahoe and receive daily breakfast, resort services credit, two daily cocktails per room, a glass of sparkling wine on arrival, included resort fee and ski valet and an on-demand shuttle to Heavenly Mountain Ski Resort. Plus, there are no blackout dates!
location_description: The Lodge at Edgewood Tahoe - April 18

title: Luxury Ski Lodge Stay in Lake Tahoe with Daily Breakfast, Hotel and Spa Credit
description:
Perched on Lake Tahoe's scenic shoreline, this resort is powdery heaven for ski buffs with champagne taste. Picture snow-capped Sierra mountains all around, world-class slopes at your doorstep and the kind of luxury that inspires you to extend your stay indefinitely.

With 150 years of history and experience, you can rest assured the team at Edgewood Tahoe Resort definitely know what they're doing. When you're not carving powder, you can fill up on delicious dishes at award-winning restaurants, treat yourself to some retail therapy or let all your worries melt away at the resort's top-notch spa.

Edgewood sits just below Heavenly’s epic slopes, where you can ski Lake Tahoe views in California by morning and desert vistas in Nevada by afternoon. Complimentary shuttles to the Gondola and Village make it all effortless. Whether you're hitting the slopes hard or settling in for a cosy ski retreat, Edgewood Tahoe Resort redefines the meaning of Tahoe luxury.

title: Lake Tahoe: A Natural Playground in Nevada
description: Known as “America’s year-round playground”, Lake Tahoe on the Nevada-California Stateline is a nature lover’s oasis with alpine skiing, snowboarding, hiking, horseback riding and white-water rafting at your fingertips. Stay at The Ridge Tahoe - located at the base of the Monument Peak ski runs - and enjoy daily breakfast and daily cocktails. Christmas dates available - perfect for families!
offer_address: 400 Ridge Club Dr, Stateline, NV 89449, USA
